description: The project requires the installation of pipe culverts,   excavation/ditching, and riprap end protection
full_summary:
### Tender Notice
**Tender Title**
EZ899-250167: Alaska Highway - Small Culvert Capital Works (2024) Invitation to Qualify

**Tender Reference**
WS4632589527-Doc4632673734

**Publication Date**
June 12, 2024

**Closing Date**
June 27, 2024, 2:00 p.m. (Quotations must be submitted)

**Summary**
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites Contractors to submit a Quotation for the construction of small culvert capital works along the Alaska Highway in the province of British Columbia. This project involves installing pipe culverts, excavating and ditching, and placing riprap end protection. The project is situated between kilometers 313 and 458 and kilometers 501 and 507 of the Alaska Highway. 

Key Components of the Project

- Installation of pipe culverts
- Excavating and ditching
- Riprap end protection
- Placing grout in decommissioned existing CSP culverts
- Hydraulic seeding of disturbed areas

**Project Requirements**
- The project must be completed by April 1, 2025.
- Sites are located approximately 500 kilometers of the Alaska Highway between Fort St. John, British Columbia and Watson Lake, Yukon.

**Notice Type**
Invitation to Qualify (ITQ)

**Contract Award Criteria**
- Lowest Price

**Tender Conditions**

* The contact address for the contract award is 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5.
* The person to contact is Summer Wong, phone none, fax none, and email [summer.wong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:summer.wong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).

Note: All Contractors are expected to register their company on the [Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)](https://www.canada.ca/en/trade-diversification/services/agreements/free-trade-agreements/canadian-free-trade-agreement.html) and the [Global Trade Item Number (GTIN)](https://www.origin2worldwide.com_servexpediting-gtin.html). 

The complete notice is available on the Discovery procurement platform at [Ariba Discovery](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/20001669).
